title: Ban from a hacker?
body: Hello i come back after taking a break from league and found out my account has been banned due to bad chat, i am changing password as i post this can someone at riot help me please

replies.body: If you think this might have taken place while your account was hacked, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by choosing "I need help recovering my account". After verifying yourself as the account creator, and as long as they can see signs of compromise during the time the ban was issued, they might be able to help out.

Hey Broporo. Sorry to use up your valued time but the rioter i was contacting after i explained my situation said they could not unban my account because what the hacker said was too toxic. i would not want to argue with the rioter because of what happened, but that really doesnt make sense to me. The hacker was too toxic for the account for me not be unbanned and not because of a lack of proof, can you shed some light on this for me.

Sorry for the slow reply, but I wanted to make sure you saw my response so I'll be re-posting it here for you as well!

"If you've already spoken with an agent in your ticket, their decision is going to be the final one essentially, but I can still provide a bit of context for you. The agent looked over your account, and there weren't any signs of it being hacked or compromised in any way. Without any evidence of someone hacking your account, it's difficult to say that the ban was issued because of the actions of someone else."

Yes i have but i dont believe they will be able to see the signs of the hack given it was a third party program that gave them access to my computer :(. that is quite unfortunate if the ban cant be lifted oh well.
